content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to use the 'get_hyperlinks' command with a specified URL, but received an error message indicating an invalid URL format. I then tried to execute a Python file using the 'execute_python_file' command, but received an error message stating that only .py files are allowed. Recently, I received a message from the AI to list files in a directory using the 'list_files' command with a specified directory. The command returned an empty list.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "<url>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_hyperlinks returned: Error: Invalid URL format', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result')]
"""
